jobDescription: Google is seeking a talented software engineer to join our team and help build the next generation of our search engine. The ideal candidate will have experience with large-scale distributed systems, as well as a deep understanding of algorithms and data structures.

Develop and maintain engineering documentation and specifications
Ensure the performance, scalability, and reliability of software systems
